name: Transformers - Animation
body:
Work Done

* Implemented keyframe string generation and storing to file keyframes.txt
* Reading back of keyframes from file line by line
* Set attribute targets and speeds for correct linear interpolation
* Invoking interpolation function in main loop, saving buffer GL_BACK as image each time the loop runs
* Stringing the dumped image files into a video using libav
* Adding audio and uploading to YouTube

***
<iframe width="560" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/wW7zNaYeoLY" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
***

Authors:

* [Ashwin Kachhara | 10D070048](https://github.com/ashwinkachhara)
* [Sumeet Fefar | 10D070001](https://github.com/sumeetfefar)

***
Credits: 
[Load Textures code by ankit-maverick](https://github.com/ankit-maverick/computergraphics/blob/master/musicbox/loadTexture.cpp)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
